bug.short_desc: After upgrading to 24 from 23 boinc client doesn't start/work anymore

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Boinc client doesn(t work anymore, doesn't start.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
[ludo@Oulanl ~]$ rpm -q boinc-client boinc-client-7.6.22-1.fc24.x86_64
[ludo@Oulanl ~]$ cat /etc/redhat-release Fedora release 24 (Twenty Four)
How reproducible:
Have boinc configured on 23 and upgrade to 24.
Actual results:
Expected results:
boinc continues running.
Additional info: [ludo@Oulanl ~]$ sudo systemctl status boinc-client.service [sudo] password for ludo: ‚óè boinc-client.service - Berkeley Open Infrastructure Network Computing Client Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/boinc-client.service; enabled; vendor preset: disabled) Active: failed (Result: exit-code) since jeu. 2016-04-21 17:37:00 CEST; 22min ago Docs: man:boinc(1) Process: 20233 ExecStop=/usr/bin/boinccmd --quit (code=exited, status=1/FAILURE) Process: 20224 ExecStart=/usr/bin/boinc_client --daemon --start delay 1 (code=exited, status=0/SUCCESS) Main PID: 1211 (code=exited, status=1/FAILURE)
avril 21 17:37:00 Oulanl systemd[1]: Starting Berkeley Open Infrastructure Network Computing Client... avril 21 17:37:00 Oulanl systemd[1]: boinc-client.service: Control process exited, code=exited status=1 avril 21 17:37:00 Oulanl systemd[1]: Failed to start Berkeley Open Infrastructure Network Computing Client. avril 21 17:37:00 Oulanl systemd[1]: boinc-client.service: Unit entered failed state. avril 21 17:37:00 Oulanl systemd[1]: boinc-client.service: Failed with result 'exit-code'.
[ludo@Oulanl ~]$ sudo systemctl start boinc-client.service Job for boinc-client.service failed because the control process exited with error code. See "systemctl status boinc-client.service" and "journalctl -xe" for details. [ludo@Oulanl ~]$ journalctl -xe
vril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl polkitd[1169]: Registered Authentication Agent for unix-process:20719:3292269 (system bus n avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl systemd[1]: Starting Berkeley Open Infrastructure Network Computing Client... -- Subject: Unit boinc-client.service has begun start-up -- Defined-By: systemd -- Support: http://lists.freedesktop.org/mailman/listinfo/systemd-devel -- -- Unit boinc-client.service has begun starting up. avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl boinc_client[20727]: 21-Apr-2016 17:59:29 BOINC is initializing... avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl boinccmd[20736]: can't connect to local host avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl systemd[1]: boinc-client.service: Control process exited, code=exited status=1 avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl systemd[1]: Failed to start Berkeley Open Infrastructure Network Computing Client. -- Subject: Unit boinc-client.service has failed -- Defined-By: systemd -- Support: http://lists.freedesktop.org/mailman/listinfo/systemd-devel -- -- Unit boinc-client.service has failed. -- -- The result is failed. avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl audit[1]: SERVICE_START pid=1 uid=0 auid=4294967295 ses=4294967295 subj=system_u:system_r:i avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl systemd[1]: boinc-client.service: Unit entered failed state. avril 21 17:59:29 Oulanl systemd[1]: boinc-client.service: Failed with result 'exit-code'.
what else can I add to make this bug actionable ?
would a priority upgrade be possible? I have eight systems to test bata(f24) and boinc on.

I am glad to announce that I fixed the bug. I wish publicly to thank the Debian BOINC mantainer, Gianfranco Costamagna, for his precious help. I am doing a few tests and in 2-3 days I will release an official update.
Have a nice day

(In reply to Germano Massullo from comment #2) > I am glad to announce that I fixed the bug. I wish publicly to thank the > Debian BOINC mantainer, Gianfranco Costamagna, for his precious help. > I am doing a few tests and in 2-3 days I will release an official update. > > Have a nice day
what needed fixing ? Also can you look into the boincmgr bug where it coredumps ?
boinc-client-7.6.22-3.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2479a25458
boinc-client-7.6.22-4.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2479a25458

boinc-client-7.6.22-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2479a25458
boinc-client-7.6.22-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
